text: Now we have the strikes and demonstrations in Ghana coinciding with the meet- ing of the Commonwealth Economic Consultative Council - the first to be held in Africa. Only a few hours after Mr Lloyd and his 24-strong delegation landed at Ac cra this morning, hundreds of shop assistants demonstrated outside the British-owned Kingsway Stores, the largest in town.
